title: Number of households in the U.S. 2015 , by age of householder
summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Age of householder, and Number of households in millions in each Age of householder on the y axis.
The maximum Number of households in millions 23.57 is found at Age of householder 45 to 54 years old and the minimum is found at 15 to 24 years old where Age of householder is 6.37.
There is a difference of 17.2 between the maximum Age of householder 45 to 54 years old and minimum Age of householder 15 to 24 years old.
min_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Age of householder, and Number of households in millions in each Age of householder on the y axis.
The Number of households in millions is highest at Age of householder 45 to 54 years old and lowest at Age of householder 15 to 24 years old.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Age of householder, and Number of households in millions in each Age of householder on the y axis.
The maximum Number of households in millions 23.57 is found at Age of householder 45 to 54 years old and the minimum is found at 15 to 24 years old where Age of householder is 6.37.
There is a difference of 17.2 between the maximum Age of householder 45 to 54 years old and minimum Age of householder 15 to 24 years old.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of households in millions for 8 number of Age of householders.
The Number of households in millions is highest at Age of householder 45 to 54 years old and lowest at Age of householder 15 to 24 years old.
The second highest Number of households in millions is appeared to be the Age of householder 55 to 64 years old.
There is a difference of 17.2 between the maximum Age of householder 45 to 54 years old and minimum Age of householder 15 to 24 years old.

Age of householder 45 to 54 years old is higher than any other Age of householders with value 23.57, followed by 55 to 64 years old, and 35 to 44 years old. Down to Age of householder 15 to 24 years old with the lowest value 6.37.
The Age of householder 15 to 24 years old tends to be 1.51 percent lower than average.
